entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:46 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:11 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 01:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 9.5°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
